H

handleButtonAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
Adds a associated part from the table view Displays an alert if nothing was selected
handleButtonAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
Handles the add button for associated parts If nothing is selected, display an alert
handleButtonAddPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Opens the add part window when the add part button is clicked
handleButtonAddProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Opens the add product window when the add product button is clicked
handleButtonCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
Returns to the mains screen without saving anything
handleButtonCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
Returns to the main scene and does not save any changes
handleButtonCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
Returns to the main scene without saving any changes
handleButtonCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
Returns to the main scene without saving any changes
handleButtonDeletePart(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Deletes the selected part when the delete button is clicked Displays an alert if nothing is selected
handleButtonDeleteProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Deletes the selected product when the delete button is clicked Displays an alert if there are associated parts with the product Displays an alert if nothing is selected
handleButtonExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
When the exit button is clicked, close the program
handleButtonModifyPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Opens the modify part window when a part is selected and the modify part button is pressed Displays an alert if no part was selected
handleButtonModifyProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Opens the modify product window when a product is selected and the modify product button is pressed Displays an alert if no product was selected
handleButtonRemove(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
Removes an associated part from the product via the table view If nothing is selected, display an alert
handleButtonRemove(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
Removes a associated part from the product If nothing is selected, display an alert
handleButtonSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
Checks that the data meets specified requirements, if not display an alert If so, save the part
handleButtonSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
Saves the new part and returns to the main scene Will display an alert if certain requirements are not met
handleButtonSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
Saves the modified part and returns to the main scene
handleButtonSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
Saves the modified part and returns to the main scene Throws an alert if a condition is not met
handlePartsTextField(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Searches for a part via the part name or the part id Displays an alert if nothing was found
handleProductsTextField(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainSceneController
Searches for a product via the product name or the product id Displays an alert if nothing was found
handleRadioInHouse(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
Sets the label to machine ID when the radio button is selected
handleRadioInHouseSelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
Sets the text for the machine ID if InHouse is selected
handleRadioOutsourced(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyPartController
Sets the label to company name when the radio button is selected
handleRadioOutsourcedSelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddPartController
Sets the text for the company name if Outsourced is selected
handleTextFieldParts(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.AddProductController
Handles the text field for parts If no part is found, display an alert If the part(s) is found, display them in the table view
handleTextFieldParts(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.ModifyProductController
Handles the text field for parts Checks the part name, if nothing was found check the ID If nothing is still found, display an alert
